author: Philip Bump
title: Why the new effort to blame coronavirus fumbles on the impeachment trial fall so far short
description: Republicans have found a new culprit for the scale of the coronavirus pandemic: Trump’s impeachment.
content:
Trump himself made this connection during an interview with Fox News on Monday.
All she did was focus on impeachment, Trump said, referring to House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.). She didnt focus on anything having to do with pandemics, she didnt focus on … [+7108 chars]
